General.Name: AVIT Ltd
General.Description: AVIT Ltd. manufactures and sells DVB products and solutions to network operators. The company offers cloud desktop management platform; VR gaming solutions; VR cameras and companion suits; multimedia service platform, a business service platform based on the two-way interactive business needs of the broadcasting industry; and cloud terminal services. It also provides TV system software and hardware solutions, VOD/ interactive TV, middleware, data broadcasting, EPG, NVOD, SMS, and others. In addition, the company offers message push systems, broadcasting transports, electronic program guides, embedded browser, VOD terminals, STB software platforms, and middleware terminals. AVIT Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Shenzhen International Innovation Valley, Shenzhen, China, 518055
